public de.fraunhofer.iem.secucheck.InternalFluentTQL.fluentInterface.MethodPackage.Method sanitizer

        decodeForHTML is a OWASP de-sanitizer that decodes the HTML related data back to HTML entities. Therefore, flow should not go though this method to avoid vulnerability.
